hero.title: Transform your <marketing>marketing</marketing> into results
hero.subtitle: The trusted marketing platform for companies that want to grow. Hire our services, work with us or build your passive income.

home.aboutText:
Founded by Alexandre Dubugras, Alchemy connects Brazilian editors with US companies seeking to elevate the quality and efficiency of their digital marketing.

We combine creativity and strategy to transform content into real results, bringing cultures together and driving brands in the global landscape.
home.threeWays: Three ways to work with Alchemy
home.forClientsDesc: Hire high-quality marketing services. Traffic management, content creation and complete strategy.
home.forEditorsDesc: Join our team. Work on amazing projects, receive fast payments and have complete support.
home.passiveIncomeDesc: Build a passive income stream by posting videos â€” your earnings are based on the performance of your posts.

client.title: For <clients>Clients</clients>
client.subtitle: Hire high-quality marketing services and transform your digital presence
client.trafficManagementDesc: We optimize your ads to maximize ROI. Complete campaign management on Google Ads, Meta Ads and more.
client.contentCreationDesc: Content that converts. Videos, posts, reels and much more created by our team of specialized editors.
client.completeStrategyDesc: Personalized strategic planning. Market analysis, persona definition and complete roadmap.
client.name: Name

editor.title: For <editors>Editors</editors>
editor.subtitle: Join our team and work on amazing projects from major brands
editor.fastPaymentsDesc: Receive your payments quickly and securely. Work on projects from major brands and earn well.
editor.diverseProjectsDesc: Work on a variety of projects. Videos, reels, posts, animations and much more for different clients.
editor.completeSupportDesc: Have access to resources, templates and team support. Grow as an editor working with professionals.
editor.name: Name
editor.tellUsPlaceholder: Talk about your experience and why you want to work with us...

passiveIncome.title: Build your <passiveIncome>Passive Income</passiveIncome>
passiveIncome.subtitle: Work with us and build a passive income source posting from the USA
passiveIncome.opportunityText: You'll need to create an account in the USA, warm it up properly, and post the videos we send you. It's simple, but requires commitment.
passiveIncome.whyText: From Brazil, it's very difficult to use VPNs to post in the USA. Platforms easily detect and block accounts. That's why we need people who are actually in the United States to ensure our content reaches the right audience.
